text: In Juno, my unicode completions were active and working no matter what file type my editor was focused on. In vscode, I can only get them to work in julia files. Can I somehow enable them for all files?

elements.text: In Juno, my unicode completions were active and working no matter what file type my editor was focused on. In vscode, I can only get them to work in julia files. Can I somehow enable them for all files?

text: You need to install a different addon.

elements.text: You need to install a different addon.
